is a major city in the
. It is also referred as Steel City because of steel plant by Steel Authority of India Ltd (SAIL).

All of the Trains passing between:

1. Mumbai and Howrah have a major Stop at Durg Junction which is just adjacent to Bhilai. 

2. Amritsar / Delhi through to Bilaspur via Nagpur also stop in these stations (primarily Durg, partialy Bhilai nagar)

Swami Vivekananda Airport formerly known as Mana (Raipur) Airport is 30 KM from Bhilai.
Take a cab from there to the city via Raipur or to the nearest rail station.
Connected by a decent Bus services to Nagpur And Bilaspur.
Most happening place in Bhilai. You can eat, have Ice Cream, and Hangout with friends. Good restaurants are Hari Raj and Veggie India. Krazy Kool is also good for Ice Cream, pizzas, etc.
